feed.title: Meelo Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Meelo: v3.0.0
entry.content:
This version introduces a microservice architecture, and therefore a complete rewrite of the scanner and matcher features, which are much faster now. The matcher's accuracy is enhanced and is less prone to failure due to rate-limiting than before.

Other notable features: - Standalone tracks (tracks do not have to belong to a release) - Rewrite the way videos are handled (a single song can have multiple videos)

:warning: This introduces a few breaking changes. You will have to rescan your libraries. The API also changed quite a bit.

What's Changed

Exciting New Features üéâ

  • Search History by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/780
  • Compute AcoustID Fingerprint and Use it to match songs by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/799
  • Standalone Tracks by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/808
  • Server: BSides across albums by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/802

Improvements, Optmizations & Enhancements üëç

  • Server: Compute Illustration Blurhash using aspect ratio by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/754
  • Server: Optimise housekeeping by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/826

Other Changes üîÄ

  • Illustration Service: Resize down the image before computing the blurhash by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/774
  • Server: Fix Spelling of 'A cappella' by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/785
  • BSides: Medleys by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/800
  • Scanner: Remove black bars on thumbnails by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/810
  • Server: Add 'Original Score' keyword to identify soundtrack albums by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/811

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/compare/v2.4.0...v3.0.0

entry.title: New release for Meelo: v3.0.1
entry.content:
Mainly security fixes

What's Changed

  • Front: Disable Spellcheck and autocompletion in Search Field by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/828

Fixes & Patches ü©π

  • Server: Refacto Seed for tests, using 'createMany' by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/833

Security üõ°

  • Scanner: Bump echo Dependency by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/829
  • Server: Bump http-proxy-middleware dependency by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/831
  • Front: Bump Next by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/832
  • Front: Bump 'cookies-next' dependency by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/834
  • Server: Remove unused deps & Bump Prisma by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/835
  • Server: Bump Cookie Parser + Prisma Type Generator deps by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/836
  • Server: Bump to Nestjs 11 by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/841
  • Server: Remove dependency to compute illustration colors by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/842

Deployment ‚öô

  • Docker: Prod: Add missing env var for nginx by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/827
  • Server: Bump node version by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/838
  • Docker: Silent Meilisearch Logs from healthcheck by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/843

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/compare/v3.0.0...v3.0.1

entry.title: New release for Meelo: v3.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Improvements, Optmizations & Enhancements üëç

  • Scanner: More flexible way of handling multiple tags for a single metadata field by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/853
  • Scanner: Fix log message order + change format by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/855

Fixes & Patches ü©π

  • Scanner: Fix to support uppercase keys in ffprobe output by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/852

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/compare/v3.0.1...v3.0.2

entry.title: New release for Meelo: v3.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Exciting New Features üéâ

  • Scanner: Allow forcing metadata refresh by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/858
  • Scanner: POST embedded lyrics by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/859
  • Front: Add 'Compilations' page by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/877
  • Front: Settings: Show Task progress by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/867

Improvements, Optmizations & Enhancements üëç

  • Front: Remove expandable button for resource description by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/872
  • Front: Infinite Query: Return concatenated list of all items by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/871
  • Server: Parser Service: Add 'EPK' keyword for interview videos by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/875
  • Front: Alway use icon as illustration fallback + add skeleton for bac‚Ä¶ by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/876

Fixes & Patches ü©π

  • Scanner: Use ID3 Compilation tag by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/863
  • Front: Make modal open on library metadata refresh by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/864
  • Matcher: Genius: Fix selector on Lyrics by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/868

Documentation üìñ

  • Docs: Remove mkdoc, use GitHub Wiki by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/865

Other Changes üîÄ

  • Scanner: Task Progress by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/866

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/compare/v3.0.2...v3.1.0

entry.title: New release for Meelo: v3.2.0
entry.content:
Mainly bug fixes and minor improvements

:warning: While it's not a breaking change, it is recommended to re-download the docker-compose.yml file and add TAG=latest to your .env

What's Changed

Exciting New Features üéâ

  • Change Grid's Items size by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/898
  • Save Queue as Playlist by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/909
  • Add 'New' Playlist button to 'Add to playlist' dialog by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/899
  • Add button to delete track from queue by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/900
  • Add BPM by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/936
  • Genres from embedded metadata can be splitted by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/890

Improvements, Optimizations & Enhancements üëç

  • Front: Release Page shows month of release by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/919
  • Front: Empty States by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/927
  • Front: Smooth Gradient Background Transition by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/932
  • Scanner: Case-insensitive tags from ffprobe by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/889
  • Deinterlace thumbnails by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/930

Fixes & Patches ü©π

  • Allow library path to be ‚Äò./‚Äò by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/937
  • Avoid duplicated items in infinite lists/grids by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/891
  • Fix bug where gradient would be transparent by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/922
  • Fix Gradient Background Flash by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/931

Documentation üìñ

  • Docker Compose: Use Docker hub + env var for tags by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/883

Security üõ°

  • Some Dependencies Bump

Deployment ‚öô

  • CI: Factorise Dockerisation step

Other Changes üîÄ

  • Server: (DX) Simplify env setup for tests by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/886
  • Server: 'Filter' API by @Arthi-chaud in https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/pull/926

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Arthi-chaud/Meelo/compare/v3.1.0...v3.2.0
